shopifyCollection.title: Camp Flags
shopifyCollection.description: Smaller four- and five-sided flags. Our original, collaboration and vintage-inspired designs with screen printed graphics.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Smaller four- and five-sided flags. Our original, collaboration and vintage-inspired designs with screen printed graphics.

products.title: Add A Frame to your Oxford Pennant Camp Flag
products.description: Add a frame to your 16" or 18" x 24" camp flag! Frames come in black, white, and natural wood finish. Final dimensions: Our 16" x 24" flag measures 18" x 26" framed and 18" x 24" is 20" x 26" framed. Note: a frame must be purchased in the same transaction as a separate pennant. Email us if you want a frame for an existing Oxford flag. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days as long as the camp flag is in-stock. Price includes UPS Ground shipping within the Continental US. International customers, please contact us for more info. All frames are final sale. * We also offer framing options for our pennants!
products.descriptionHtml:
Add a frame to your 16" or 18" x 24" camp flag! Frames come in black, white, and natural wood finish. 

Final dimensions: Our 16" x 24" flag measures 18" x 26" framed and 18" x 24" is 20" x 26" framed.

Note: a frame must be purchased in the same transaction as a separate pennant. Email us if you want a frame for an existing Oxford flag. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days as long as the camp flag is in-stock.

Price includes UPS Ground shipping within the Continental US. International customers, please contact us for more info. All frames are final sale.

* We also offer framing options for our pennants!

products.title: Together We Will See It Through Camp Flag
products.description: This design came to be in March 2020 and was partly inspired by a sign that was posted around Buffalo roughly 100 years ago — a period of time when the nation was recovering from both a World War and a pandemic. If you'd like to print out the design of this flag to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. Size: 18" x 24" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design Color: Cream body, Blue and Red details Ships with a pair of suction cup hooks to display flag on an exterior window.
products.descriptionHtml:
This design came to be in March 2020 and was partly inspired by a sign that was posted around Buffalo roughly 100 years ago — a period of time when the nation was recovering from both a World War and a pandemic. 

If you'd like to print out the design of this flag to color in, or hang in your window, download it here. 

Size: 18" x 24"

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: Cream body, Blue and Red details

Ships with a pair of suction cup hooks to display flag on an exterior window.

products.title: Yes You Can Camp Flag • Kelle Hampton x Oxford Pennant Original

Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome. A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education. products.title: Believe Camp Flag
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} Wow! This design is one of our best sellers! We are constantly sewing & printing new inventory to keep up with demand. At times, your order may take up to two weeks to ship. We’ll send tracking information as soon as it heads out! Do you believe in miracles? A camp flag inspired by one of our favorite shows, for those moments when you need a little reminder. Size: 16" x 24" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design Color: Gold body, royal details

products.title: Are We There Yet Camp Flag

This camp flag is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. products.title: PRESALE: The Distinguished Gentleman's Ride 2021 Camp Flag
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} The official memento of the 2021 Distinguished Gentleman's Ride 20% of proceeds from this camp flag will be donated to the Distinguished Gentlemen's Ride to raise funds and awareness for prostate cancer research and men’s mental health. products.descriptionHtml:
The official memento of the 2021 Distinguished Gentleman's Ride

20% of proceeds from this camp flag will be donated to the Distinguished Gentlemen's Ride to raise funds and awareness for prostate cancer research and men’s mental health.

Please note, this items is part of a presale and will ship the last week of June.

Size: 18" x 24" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design

Color: Black body, Cream and Gold details
